alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 30 at 11:14AM MST until January 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West wind 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 mph possible. Locally higher wind gusts around, and west of Clark. * WHERE...Cody Foothills, especially around Clark, and West of Clark. * WHEN...2 AM Monday until 5 PM Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous, as sudden strong wind gusts will increase the blowover risk of lightweight and high profile vehicles. This includes highway 120.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means there is the potential for a hazardous high wind event. Sustained winds of at least 40 mph...or gusts of 58 mph or stronger may occur. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
